LanguageData.CrashlandedCentaur.label: Centaur Crashlanded
LanguageData.CrashlandedCentaur.description: The three of you awake in your cryptosleep sarcophagi to the sound of sirens and ripping metal. You barely get to the escape pods before the ship is torn apart. Some time later, you land on this unknown rimworld.
LanguageData.CrashlandedCentaur.scenario.name: Centaur Crashlanded
LanguageData.CrashlandedCentaur.scenario.summary: Three crashlanded survivors - but now they have more legs each. Not like in a weird cannibal sort of way though, they're centaurs. Sorry if that was a bit confusing there.
LanguageData.CrashlandedCentaur.scenario.description: The three of you awake in your cryptosleep sarcophagi to the sound of sirens and ripping metal. You barely get to the escape pods before the ship is torn apart. Some time later, you land on this unknown rimworld.
